data.name: Together: Moon Escape
data.detailed_description:
Stranded on the Moon. Out of fuel. Out of luck. And somehow... still laughing.

In Together: Moon Escape, you and a partner must cooperate to escape a chaotic lunar mission gone very, very wrong. Explore a variety of handcrafted levels â€” from crumbling space stations to dusty caves and eerie lunar bases â€” all packed with puzzles, surprises, and way too many Slimes.

This is not your average serious space game. Expect absurd tools, ridiculous logic, and nonstop co-op chaos. Whether you're arguing over a puzzle or laughing at your partner falling into a crater (again), youâ€™ll need each other to get home.

ðŸ§  Features

  • 2-player online or local co-op â€“ Grab a friend and play split-screen or over the internet. No solo mode: this Moon demands teamwork.

  • Chaotic co-op puzzles â€“ Communication is key! Youâ€™ll each see different things, control different systems, or need to act in perfect sync.

  • Lunar exploration â€“ Escape across varied environments like the Moonâ€™s surface, dark caves, derelict ships, and secret facilities.

  • Ridiculous tools â€“ Use special weapons and gadgets like the Slime Blaster or the Slime Vision Goggles to solve puzzles and prank your partner.

  • Optimized for smooth performance â€“ Built with Unreal Engine and fully optimized for low-end systems and Steam Deck (runs at 60fps).

  • Short, sweet, and full of laughter â€“ Designed to be completed in a few sessions, but with plenty of replay value and jokes to keep you coming back.

data.short_description: Trapped on the Moon, two astronauts must work together to escape! Solve clever co-op puzzles, share laughs, and survive a hilarious lunar adventure with your partner.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Spain*, Catalan*
*languages with full audio support
